Jordan Brock

Watson induced humble pie

Mar 25, 2007

As much as it pains me to say it, Watson’s throw was simply brilliant. Fast, hard and accurate. Totally game changing.

p. It’s hard not to see South Africa’s performance as a continuation of their susceptibility to pressure in big games. True, the game was just a group match, but the two points that get taken through to the next stage are important, and you could tell that each team desperately wanted the win.
